issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
There is a HD Support ticket having this issue: http://support.appcelerator.com/display/APP-578943

It looks like we update the overlay every time an annotation is added, and that is burdening the app.

Affecting therefore the performance of adding multiple annotations.
fields.summary: Android Boosting the performance of adding annotations
fields.environment:
+ **Product**: Mobile 
+ **Titanium SDK**: Mobile 1.7.0 RC1 
+ **Platform OS**: Android 
+ **Platform OS Version**: 10

comments.body: Use the array form to add annotations to boost performance.
